attributes.action: Restrict the sale by wholesalers and DIY stoes of certain electrical equipment to registered electricaians only
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Part P of the Building regulations  require that certain electrical work carried out in domestic premises should comply,and be registered with the local Authority building reduce give some regulation to the domestic electrical installations.

We ask that inline with practices for the supply of certain gas installing equipment that certain electrical items should only be available to electricans who can produce vailid identification issued by recognised trade organisations to electricans who meet the required standard to install in domestic premises.
